nodes.description: 高峰时段孟买七列火车发生爆炸，造成714人受伤
nodes.support_text: The bombs exploded at the height of the rush-hour As bomb squads combed the wrecked carriages, a leading militant group denied it was behind the attacks. The blasts in compartments on seven trains also left 714 people injured.

nodes.description: 炸弹小组检查残骸，激进组织否认责任
nodes.support_text: Bomb squads combed the wrecked carriages where the seven co-ordinated blasts occurred.

nodes.description: 总理曼莫汉·辛格将发表全国讲话
nodes.support_text: Prime Minister Manmohan Singh will shortly address the nation.

nodes.description: 铁路部分恢复运营，大量乘客改乘公交车
nodes.support_text: Much of Mumbai's railways are working again, although many people used buses.

nodes.description: 警方搜查并拘留嫌疑人，未完成逮捕
nodes.support_text: Police say they have raided sites in the area and detained suspects for questioning, but made no arrests.

nodes.description: 安全官员称袭击由主要恐怖组织精心策划
nodes.support_text: Security officials say it was a well planned operation masterminded by a major terrorist outfit.
Lashkar-e-Toiba... rejected suggestions... Hizb-ul-Mujahideen also condemned the blasts.

nodes.description: 超过12小时后，民众仍在医院寻找失踪亲人
nodes.support_text: More than 12 hours later, many people were still frantically searching for relatives.

nodes.description: 孟买郊区铁路系统在爆炸后关闭，数万人被困
nodes.support_text: In the immediate aftermath of the blasts the city's entire rail network was shut down, stranding hundreds of thousands of people.

nodes.description: 印度铁路部长宣布受害者赔偿计划
nodes.support_text: Indian railway minister Laloo Prasad Yadav has announced financial help for the victims.

nodes.description: 袭击是十多年来的最严重，1993年有250人死亡
nodes.support_text: The attacks are the worst in the city for more than a decade. More than 250 people died in a string of blasts in 1993.

nodes.description: 哈马斯组织谴责七列火车爆炸事件
印度快报记者Anumeha Yadav向BBC《世界今日》节目报道了截肢事件
nodes.support_text: 印度快报记者Anumeha Yadav向BBC《世界今日》节目报道了截肢事件

edges.support_text: Bomb squads combed the wrecked carriages where the seven co-ordinated blasts occurred.
In the immediate aftermath of the blasts the city's entire rail network was shut down.
Prime Minister Manmohan Singh will shortly address the nation.
The attacks are the worst in the city for more than a decade.
Indian railway minister Laloo Prasad Yadav has announced financial help.
Lashkar-e-Toiba... rejected suggestions... Hizb-ul-Mujahideen also condemned the blasts.
Security officials say it was a well planned operation masterminded by a major terrorist outfit. Hizb-ul-Mujahideen also condemned the blasts.
Police said they have raided sites in the area and detained suspects for questioning.
More than 12 hours later, many people were still frantically searching for relatives.
